page.title: 13Local Government
page.content: This block is within the area administered by the Avenbury Parish Council, which in turn, is answerable to the Malvern Hills District Council, in the county of Hereford and Worcester. Services for this area are concentrated in Malvern, though there is a local office in Bromyard. The parish council has worked hard and due to their pressure there is a mains water supply (under the control of the Welsh Water Authority), electricity, sewerage, and a fortnightly refuse collection. In this area there are three justices of the peace, one of whom sits on two benches. The area is well sign-posted.
